import Retweet from "./img/Retweet.png" import Like from "./img/Like.png" import Comment from "./img/Comment.png" import Upload from "./img/Upload.png" import Graph from "./img/Graph.png" import './App.css'; function App() { const RAY_IMAGE = "https://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/5e63b3c8e1e617000759130e/960x0.jpg?fit=scale"; const content = "WTF? Who is Ray? Why she is Skywalker? ); } export default App;
